languages.text: "Я не сомневаюсь в безукоризненности ваших решений. Кроме того... Я впечатлена вашей персоной. Мне доводилось слышать о {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}жестоких истязаниях{/d}, что вы пережили, Лорд-капитан". {n}Мастер дисциплины отводит взгляд, в котором заиграл странный огонек.{/n} "Ваша стойкость восхищает".

"I do not doubt the astuteness of your decisions. But beyond that... I am impressed with you. I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."
languages.original_text: "Я не сомневаюсь в безукоризненности ваших решений. Кроме того... Я впечатлена вашей персоной. Мне доводилось слышать о {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}жестоких истязаниях{/d}, что вы пережили, Лорд-капитан". {n}Мастер дисциплины отводит взгляд, в котором заиграл странный огонек.{/n} "Ваша стойкость восхищает".

I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."

languages.text: "Ich zweifle nicht am Scharfsinn Eurer Entscheidungen. Aber abgesehen davon ... Bin ich von Euch beeindruckt. Ich habe von den {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutalen Bestrafungen{/d} gehört, die Ihr erdulden musstet, Lord Captain." {n}Als sie ihren Blick abwendet, bemerkst du ein seltsames Funkeln in ihren Augen.{/n} "Eure Zähigkeit ist bewundernswert."
languages.original_text: "I do not doubt the astuteness of your decisions. But beyond that... I am impressed with you. I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."

traits.locale_text: "Ich zweifle nicht am Scharfsinn Eurer Entscheidungen. Aber abgesehen davon ... Bin ich von Euch beeindruckt. Ich habe von den {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutalen Bestrafungen{/d} gehört, die Ihr erdulden musstet, Lord Captain." {n}Als sie ihren Blick abwendet, bemerkst du ein seltsames Funkeln in ihren Augen.{/n} "Eure Zähigkeit ist bewundernswert."

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais douté de la pertinence de vos décisions. Mais au-delà de ça... je dois avouer que vous m'impressionnez. J'ai entendu parler du {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}calvaire{/d} que vous avez enduré, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Elle détourne les yeux, mais pas avant que vous ayez décelé une étrange lueur, dans son regard.{/n} « Votre ténacité force l'admiration. »
languages.original_text: "I do not doubt the astuteness of your decisions. But beyond that... I am impressed with you. I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais douté de la pertinence de vos décisions. Mais au-delà de ça... je dois avouer que vous m'impressionnez. J'ai entendu parler du {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}calvaire{/d} que vous avez enduré, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. » {n}Elle détourne les yeux, mais pas avant que vous ayez décelé une étrange lueur, dans son regard.{/n} « Votre ténacité force l'admiration. »

languages.text: «No pongo en duda la sagacidad de sus decisiones. Pero además de eso... Me impresiona usted. He oído hablar de los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutales tormentos{/d} que ha padecido, Lord Capitán». {n}Desvía la mirada, pero antes de que lo haga percibes un extraño destello en sus ojos.{/n} «Su tenacidad me parece digna de admiración».
languages.original_text: "I do not doubt the astuteness of your decisions. But beyond that... I am impressed with you. I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."

traits.locale_text: «No pongo en duda la sagacidad de sus decisiones. Pero además de eso... Me impresiona usted. He oído hablar de los {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutales tormentos{/d} que ha padecido, Lord Capitán». {n}Desvía la mirada, pero antes de que lo haga percibes un extraño destello en sus ojos.{/n} «Su tenacidad me parece digna de admiración».

languages.text: 「あなたの聡明な判断を疑ってはいません。ただ、それ以上に…感銘を受けたのです。あなたが耐え忍ばれたという{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}残忍な処罰{/d}のことは聞いています、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は視線を反らす。けれどその直前、あなたは彼女の目に奇妙な輝きを見る。{/n}「その忍耐強さは称賛に値します」
languages.original_text: "I do not doubt the astuteness of your decisions. But beyond that... I am impressed with you. I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの聡明な判断を疑ってはいません。ただ、それ以上に…感銘を受けたのです。あなたが耐え忍ばれたという{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}残忍な処罰{/d}のことは聞いています、ロード・キャプテン」{n}彼女は視線を反らす。けれどその直前、あなたは彼女の目に奇妙な輝きを見る。{/n}「その忍耐強さは称賛に値します」

languages.text: “我从来不会怀疑您精明的决定。不过，除此之外……您还给我留下了深刻的印象。我听说您之前遭受过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}残忍的惩罚{/d}，舰长大人。”{n}她移开了视线，但在她移开视线之前，你注意到她的目光中带着某种古怪的火花。{/n}“您坚韧不屈的精神值得钦佩。”
languages.original_text: "I do not doubt the astuteness of your decisions. But beyond that... I am impressed with you. I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."

traits.locale_text: “我从来不会怀疑您精明的决定。不过，除此之外……您还给我留下了深刻的印象。我听说您之前遭受过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}残忍的惩罚{/d}，舰长大人。”{n}她移开了视线，但在她移开视线之前，你注意到她的目光中带着某种古怪的火花。{/n}“您坚韧不屈的精神值得钦佩。”

languages.text: "Son derece akıllıca kararlar aldığınıza dair hiçbir şüphem yok. Ama bunun da ötesinde... Beni çok etkilediniz. Maruz kaldığınız {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}sert cezalar{/d} hakkında çok şey duydum Lord Kaptan." {n}Gözlerini kaçırıyor ama bunu yapmadan önce gözlerinde tuhaf bir kıvılcım fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Azminiz takdir uyandırıcı."
languages.original_text: "I do not doubt the astuteness of your decisions. But beyond that... I am impressed with you. I have heard about the {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}brutal punishments{/d} that you have endured, Lord Captain." {n}She looks away, but before she does so, you notice a strange spark in her eyes.{/n} "Your tenacity deserves admiration."
